definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip

sentences.english: Unable to open the selected audio device for recording.
sentences.chinese: 无法打开选定的音频设备进行录制。

sentences.english: A few audio equipment are attached to the Mitsubishi TV and are not used often.
sentences.chinese: 一些音频设备连接到三菱电视和不经常使用。

sentences.english: Sorry, there was a problem with my audio equipment. How do you read me now?
sentences.chinese: 抱歉，我的音频设备有问题。现在你听我几个？

sentences.english: You must have an audio device installed in order to encode from device.
sentences.chinese: 要从设备编码，必须已安装音频设备。

sentences.english: It connects the chassis of the sound equipment to the building's electrical ground.
sentences.chinese: 它连接了音频设备的底盘和建筑物的地线。

sentences.english: SDL_PauseAudio§() finally starts the audio device.
sentences.chinese: 暂停音频最终启开了音频设备。

sentences.english: The invention discloses an output controlling means of audio frequency apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了音频设备的输出控制方法。

sentences.english: You must have an audio device in order to encode.
sentences.chinese: 您必须具有音频设备以进行编码。

sentences.english: The range of frequencies an audio device can reproduce from its input signals.
sentences.chinese: 一个音频设备能对其输入信号作出响应的频率范围。
